titleStmt.title: SII 13.309: original edition by G.V. Srinivasa Rao
No. 309. (A.R. No. 308 of 1910.) NĀLŪR, PAPANASAM TALUK, TANJORE DISTRICT. ON THE DOOR-POSTS AT THE ENTRANCE INTO THE PALĀŚAPURĪŚVARA TEMPLE.

summary.p: The characters of the inscription are early. It is slightly damaged, and it seems to register an agreement of the mahāsabhā of Nālūr a brahmadēya in Śēṟṟūrkūṟṟam undertaking to receive no other tax than taṭṭiṟai on the produce of an arecagarden in Vaḍaśāttaṉgudi alias Kaḷarañjēnda-chaturvēdimaṅgalam, which had been leased by the shareholders of the village. The sabhā is said to have met for this deliberation in the hall (?) called Vaṇṇakkanār-ambalaṁ.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . korāja
kesaripanmaṟkku yāṇṭu I
rupattunālāvatu ceṟ
ṟūrkkūṟṟattu piramateya
ṉ nālūr vaṇṇakkanā
rampalattu mahāsabhai kū
ṭiyirukka Āritan kalaiyaṉ
mātavanukku māṭalaṉ kaṭam
papiṭāranum māṭalaṉ ceṭa
ṉ kāṭanum kaviṇiyaṉ tā
yaṉ tattanu� kaviṇiya
ṉ vaṭukam pūtiyum Iñāl
(ñā)vom vaṭacāttaṅkuṭi
āyina kaḷarañceṉta
caruppetimaṅkalattu paṅ
kupeṟṟa kaviṇiyan Iḷaiya
aṅki kāṭapaṭṭarum kaviṇiya
ṉ nāraṇa tattapaṭṭarum kutta
ṅ kuttapaṭṭarum kaviṇiya
ṉ kuttaṅ kumaraṉpaṭṭarum mā
ṭalaṉ ṉaṅki nakkacomāciyā
rum māṭalaṉ vaṭukaṉ vāmaṉac
comāciyārum kaviṇiyan pūta
ṉ tāyaccomāciyārum māṭala
ṉ ceṭṭi ceṭṭicomāciyārum kavi
ṇiyaṉ kecavaṉ ceṉta
num Ivaṉṟampi Aiyan
Ivvaṉaivom Irupattā
ṟāvatumutalThis is evidently a mistake for irupattu nālāvatu mutalkantanor
mele nilameṟṟikkoṇṭu
1- rāyirattorunūṟṟaiñpa
tu kamikināl taṭṭiṟaiye ko
ḷvomānoṉ nālūr mahāsa
bhaiyom nilamaḷantu Iṟai ko
ḷka E(ṟu)ṉṟu coṉṉār paṭṭadivāka
ra sarvvakratukkaḷaiyum marutū
raiyum piḻaittākavum nilamaḷa
ṉtu Iṟaikoḷka Eṉṟār vevv(o)
ṟṟuvakai Irupattaiñkaḻañcu
poṉ taṇṭappaṭuvatāka Ippari
cu vyavasthai ceytom ma
hāsabhaiyom Ivarkaḷ pa
ṇikka Eḻutineṉ Āyirattu nā
nūṟṟunāṟpatiṉva maṅkalātita
(ṉ)ṉākiya nūṟṟirupatiṉ kāṭanen
vaṭacāttaṅkuṭi Iḻiñcu tāne Āccu .
Digital edition of SII 13.309 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Emmanuel Francis.
